mapper.select: SELECT v.code ,v.ve_name FROM VE_MANAGE AS v WHERE v.ve_state = '사용가능' AND v.ve_use = '출장용' AND v.code IN(SELECT r.co_name FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r WHERE r.re_start NOT BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND r.re_end NOT BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND r.division = '차량')

SELECT v.code ,v.ve_name FROM VE_MANAGE AS v WHERE v.ve_state = '사용가능' AND v.ve_use = '출장용' AND NOT v.code = ANY(SELECT r.co_name FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r WHERE r.re_start BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND r.re_end BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND r.division = '차량')

SELECT r.code ,r.co_name ,r.emp_code ,r.re_start ,r.re_end ,e.emp_name AS empName ,v.ve_name ,d.dename AS deName FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE AS e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN VE_MANAGE AS v ON r.co_name = v.code LEFT join DEMG AS d ON e.demgcode = d.code WHERE r.division = '차량'
SELECT r.code ,r.re_start ,r.re_end ,r.emp_code FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r WHERE r.CODE = #{code}

SELECT f.code ,f.fa_name FROM FACILITY_MANAGE AS f WHERE f.fa_st = '사용가능' AND f.code IN (SELECT r.co_name FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r WHERE r.re_start NOT BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND r.re_end NOT BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} and r.division = '시설')

SELECT f.code ,f.fa_name FROM FACILITY_MANAGE AS f WHERE f.fa_st = '사용가능' AND NOT f.code = ANY(SELECT r.co_name FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r WHERE r.re_start BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} AND r.re_end BETWEEN #{startDay} AND #{endDay} and r.division = '시설')

SELECT r.code ,r.co_name ,r.emp_code ,r.re_start ,r.re_end ,e.emp_name AS empName ,f.fa_name ,d.dename AS deName FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE AS e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN FACILITY_MANAGE AS f ON r.co_name = f.code LEFT join DEMG AS d ON e.demgcode = d.CODE WHERE r.division = '시설'

SELECT r.code ,r.division ,r.emp_code ,r.co_name ,r.re_start ,r.re_end ,e.emp_name AS empName ,v.ve_name ,f.fa_name ,r.re_com_check FROM RESER_MANAGE AS r LEFT JOIN EMP_MANAGE AS e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN VE_MANAGE AS v ON r.co_name = v.CODE LEFT JOIN FACILITY_MANAGE AS f ON r.co_name = f.code WHERE r.emp_code = #{sid}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESER_MANAGE AS r SET r.re_com_check = 'Y' ,r.re_com = NOW() ,r.re_check_name = #{sid} WHERE r.CODE = #{code}
